title: Warner Bros. Discovery - Discovery Communications Agrees to Take Full Control of Eurosport
snippet: – Discovery Communications (Nasdaq: DISCA, DISCB, DISCK) today announced an agreement to acquire full ownership of Eurosport, the leading sports channels group across Europe and Asia, for €491 million from TF1 Group, which has announced it will exercise a put option on its 49% ownership ...

title: Eurosport - Wikipedia
snippet: On 5 January 2021, Discovery began ... company formed after the merger of Discovery with WarnerMedia—announced an agreement to contribute Eurosport's United Kingdom operations into a joint venture with BT Group....

title: AT&T and Discovery Close WarnerMedia Transaction
snippet: The new company combines WarnerMedia’s premium entertainment, sports and news assets with Discovery’s leading non-fiction and international entertainment and sports businesses, including Discovery Channel, discovery+, Warner Bros. Entertainment, CNN, CNN+, DC, Eurosport, HBO, HBO Max, HGTV, Food Network, Investigation Discovery, TLC, TNT, TBS, truTV, Travel Channel, MotorTrend, Animal Planet, Science Channel, New Line Cinema, Cartoon Network, Adult Swim, Turner Classic Movies and others.

title: Warner Bros. Discovery International - Wikipedia
snippet: On 21 January 2014, Discovery acquired an additional 51% share to gain controlling interest, and subsequently acquired the remainder for €491 million in July 2015 to receive sole ownership.
